subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Maicer Izturis and Vladimir Guerrero hit back-to-back homers, and Kelvim Escobar allowed four hits over seven and two-thirds innings yesterday to lead the visiting Los Angeles Angels to a 5-2 victory against the Chicago White Sox.
snippet: Maicer Izturis and Vladimir Guerrero hit back-to-back homers, and Kelvim Escobar allowed four hits over seven and two-thirds innings yesterday to lead the visiting Los Angeles Angels to a 5-2 victory against the Chicago White Sox.
